name: 3D Munchy
overview: 3D Munchy is a PacMan style game using an isometric view. It was written by Mike Williams of MRM, and developed and published by MRM. It was released for the BBC Microcomputer in 1983. You have to eat all dots while avoiding enemies. The enemies will dig holes which you can however refill (although you have a limited amount of shovels). You can eat the enemies if you eat a red super pill. However, unlike Pac-Man this game has a very limited timer.
